name: Mylee Ejercito
text: Because it would just be people in front of laptops and people in conference calls.

source_obj.text: Because it would just be people in front of laptops and people in conference calls.

replies.text: It would be a slice of life anime interspersed with very... INTENSE conference calls. Like ace attorney but with video conferencing.

David  The juicy parts of conf calls is what gets said when the 'mute' button is on. Even better when someone forgot to mute themselves and everyone gets to hear the fun bits they're not supposed to hear
And people would announce intrusions and attempts as if they were special attacks.
